name: Roll A Ball (Ben.Farris)
description:
Roll A Ball was created using Unity's Roll-A-Ball tutorial. 

The game is played using the arrow keys. Once the game loads on the page you will need to click in the game window to have the arrow keys functioning. 

In order to win you need to gain 16 count, IN ADDITION TO THE WINNING CUBE!!!

          ~ The yellow and orange pick ups give you points.

          ~ The red pick up is the winning cube.
